template.template: SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0
template.name: SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/CPU_load_Integra_X)>80
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/CPU_load_Integra_X)<75
trigger.name: High CPU Load

trigger.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0
trigger.name: ICMP Not Available
trigger.description: Last three attempts returned timeout. Please check device connectivity.

trigger.expression: min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100
trigger.name: High ICMP Loss

dependency.name: ICMP Not Available
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: avg(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingsec,5m)>{$ICMP_RESPONSE_TIME_WARN}
trigger.name: High ICMP Response Time

dependency.name: High ICMP Loss
dependency.expression: min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: ICMP Not Available
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: avg(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingsec,5m)>{$ICMP_RESPONSE_TIME_WARN}
trigger.name: {HOST.HOST} High ICMP Response Time

dependency.name: High ICMP Loss
dependency.expression: min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: ICMP Not Available
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

item.name: LAN1 Administrative Status
item.description: Desired state of network interfaces. Interfaces can be enabled(1), disabled(2), unknown(3) (no info received).

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan1,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan1,#2))=1
trigger.name: LAN1 Administrative Status Changed

item.name: LAN2 Administrative Status
item.description: Desired state of network interfaces. Interfaces can be enabled(1), disabled(2), unknown(3) (no info received).

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan2,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan2,#2))=1
trigger.name: LAN2 Administrative Status Changed

item.name: LAN3 Administrative Status
item.description: Desired state of network interfaces. Interfaces can be enabled(1), disabled(2), unknown(3) (no info received).

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan3,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan3,#2))=1
trigger.name: LAN3 Administrative Status Changed

item.name: LAN1 Port Speed
item.description: Link speed in 1 000 000 * bits per second.

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN1)=1
trigger.name: LAN1 Port Speed Changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN2)=1
trigger.name: LAN2 Port Speed Changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortHighSpeed_LAN3)=1
trigger.name: LAN3 Port Speed Changed

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_WANLP,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_WANLP,#2))=1
trigger.name: WAN port operational status changed

item.name: ACM Engine Status ModemA
item.description: ACM engine status

trigger.expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAerroredSecond))>1
trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAerroredSecond))=0
trigger.name: Modem A Errored Seconds Count Increased

item.name: ModemA Errored Seconds Ratio
item.description: Modem performance errored second ratio

item.name: FEC Load ModemA
item.description: Decoder stress or FEC load value (floating point in textual representation)

item.name: ModemA Modulation ACM MAX
item.description: Maximal modulation for ACM enabled profile

item.name: ModemA Modulation ACM MIN
item.description: Minimal modulation for ACM enabled profile

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemArxCapacity)=1
trigger.name: Modem A Rx Capacity Changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemArxModulation)=1
trigger.name: Modem-A Rx Modulation Changed

item.name: ModemA Severely Errored Seconds
item.description: Modem performance severely errored seconds

trigger.expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAseverelyErroredSecond))>1
trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAseverelyErroredSecond))=0
trigger.name: Modem A Severely Errored Seconds Count Increased

item.name: ModemA Severely Errored Seconds Ratio
item.description: Modem performance severely errored second ratio

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAtxCapacity)=1
trigger.name: Modem A Tx Capacity Changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemAtxModulation)=1
trigger.name: Modem-A Tx Modulation Changed

item.name: ModemA XPD Estimated
item.description: XPD Estimated value (floating point value multiplied by 10)

item.name: ACM Engine Status ModemB
item.description: ACM engine status

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBandwidth)=1
trigger.name: Bandwidth changed {SAF Integra-X Modem module v_1.9:integraXmodemBandwidth.last()}

item.name: ModemB Errored Seconds
item.description: Modem performance errored seconds

trigger.expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBerroredSecond))>1
trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBerroredSecond))=0
trigger.name: Modem B Errored Seconds Count Increased

item.name: ModemB Errored Seconds Ratio
item.description: Modem performance errored second ratio

item.name: FEC Load ModemB
item.description: Decoder stress or FEC load value

item.name: ModemB Modulation ACM MAX
item.description: Maximal modulation for ACM enabled profile

item.name: ModemB Modulation ACM MIN
item.description: Minimal modulation for ACM enabled profile

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBrxCapacity)=1
trigger.name: Modem B Rx Capacity Changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBrxModulation)=1
trigger.name: Modem B Rx Modulation Changed

item.name: ModemB Severely Errored Seconds
item.description: Modem performance severely errored seconds

trigger.expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBseverelyErroredSecond))>10
trigger.recovery_expression: abs(change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBseverelyErroredSecond))<5
trigger.name: Modem B Severely Errored Seconds Increased

item.name: ModemB Severely Errored Seconds Ratio
item.description: Modem performance severely errored second ratio

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBtxCapacity)=1
trigger.name: Modem B Tx Capacity Changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXmodemBtxModulation)=1
trigger.name: Modem B Tx Modulation Changed

item.name: ModemB XPD Estimated
item.description: XPD Estimated value (floating point value multiplied by 10)

item.name: IP Address Local
item.description: Local IP address

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXnetCfgIPaddress)=1
trigger.name: IP Address Changed

item.name: IP Address Remote
item.description: Remote IP address

item.name: Duplex Shift
item.description: Utilized duplex shift in kHz

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioArxFrequency)=1
trigger.name: Radio A Rx Frequency Changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioAtxFrequency)=1
trigger.name: Radio A Tx Frequency Changed

item.name: Tx Power RadioA
item.description: Output power of radio transmitter

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioAtxPower)=1
trigger.name: Radio A Tx Power Changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioBrxFrequency)=1
trigger.name: Radio B Rx Frequency Changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioBtxFrequency)=1
trigger.name: Radio B Tx Frequency Changed

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXradioBtxPower)=1
trigger.name: Radio B Tx power changed

item.name: CPU Idle
item.description: System CPU idle

item.name: CPU Temperature
item.description: System CPU Temperature

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXsysDeviceProductModel)=1
trigger.name: Product Model Changed

item.name: Device Serial Number
item.description: Device serial number

trigger.expression: change(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXsysDeviceSerial)=1
trigger.name: Device Serial Number Changed

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/IntegraX_System_Memory_used)>95
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/IntegraX_System_Memory_used)<90
trigger.name: High System Memory Usage

item.name: System Contact Details
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: System Description
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: System Location
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: System Hostname
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node.By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

trigger.expression: (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/system.name,#1)<>last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/system.name,#2))=1 and length(last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/system.name))>0
trigger.name: System Name Has Changed (New Name: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: System name has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: System Object ID
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The vendor's authoritative identification of the network management subsystem contained in the entity. This value is allocated within the SMI enterprises subtree (1.3.6.1.4.1) and provides an easy and unambiguous means for determining`what kind of box' is being managed. For example, if vendor`Flintstones, Inc.' was assigned the subtree1.3.6.1.4.1.4242, it could assign the identifier 1.3.6.1.4.1.4242.1.1 to its `Fred Router'.

item.name: Uptime
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/system.uptime[sysUpTime.0])<10m
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Has Been Restarted (Uptime < 10m)

dependency.name: SNMP Not Available
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/zabbix[host,snmp,available],{$SNMP.TIMEOUT})=0

item.name: SNMP agent availability
item.description: Availability of SNMP checks on the host. The value of this item corresponds to availability icons in the host list. Possible value: 0 - not available 1 - available 2 - unknown

trigger.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/zabbix[host,snmp,available],{$SNMP.TIMEOUT})=0
trigger.name: SNMP Not Available
trigger.description: SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

dependency.name: ICMP Not Available
dependency.expression: max(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan1)=1 and (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN1)=2 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN1)=3)
trigger.name: LAN1 Port DOWN Latest Data

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan2)=1 and (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN2)=2 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN2)=3)
trigger.name: LAN2 Port DOWN Latest Data

trigger.expression: last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortAdminStatus_lan3)=1 and (last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN3)=2 or last(/SAF Basic Integra-X template V1.0 for Zabbix 6.0/integraXifPortOperStatus_LAN3)=3)
trigger.name: LAN3 Port DOWN Latest Data
